entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CALM WINDS

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR

MOSTLY CLEAR

MOSTLY CLEAR

HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
